article.simpara: Hue, http://gethue.com, is an open source Web UI for easily doing Big Data analysis with Hadoop.

listitem.simpara: SQL editors for Hive, Impala, MySQL, Oracle, PostGresl, SparkSQL, Solr SQL, Phoenix…
Dynamic Search dashboards with Solr
Spark and Hadoop notebooks
Scheduling of jobs and workflows through an Oozie Editor and Dashboard

article.simpara: More user and developer documentation is available at http://gethue.com.

section.title: Latest Notable Features
section.simpara: The complete list and video demos are on http://gethue.com/hue-3-11-with-its-new-s3-browser-and-sql-autocomplete-is-out/.

listitem.simpara: List, browse
Upload, download
Create external Hive table
Export query result
List S3 URI in Sentry
Set Oozie coordinator dependencies on S3 paths
Brand new SQL grammar for Hive and Impala
Support all the major operations like SELECT, CREATE, DROP
Autocomplete UDFs and show their documentation
Weight keywords and columns by importance
Infer the types and propose compatible columns or UDFs
See more in https://issues.cloudera.org/browse/HUE-4039
Result grid improvements
Timeout popup when Impala hangs on fetch result
Offer to fix certain rows
Search through the results
Excel download now has a progress status
Fixed resultset legend and header when scrolling throught the results
Column and type search
Optimized to display hundred columns
Export SQL query result to Solr
New indexer
Leverage Morphline to submit a MapReduce jobs that scales
Offer light ETL operations like splitting a field, GeoIp, replace, grok

section.title: Compatibility
section.simpara: Runs on CentOS versions 5 to 6, Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL 5 and 6), and Ubuntu 12.04 and 14.04.

listitem.simpara: Hadoop 2.6.0
Hive 1.1
Oozie 4.1
HBase 1.2
Pig 0.12
Impala 2.5
Solr 4.10
Sqoop2 1.99.5
Spark 1.6

section.simpara: These minimum versions should work (not tested):

listitem.simpara: Hive 0.12.0
Oozie 3.2
HBase 0.92
Pig 0.8
Impala 1.0
Solr 3.6
Sqoop2 1.99.3
Spark 1.4

section.simpara: Hue works with the two most recent versions of the following browsers. Make sure cookies and JavaScript are turned on for the browser.

listitem.simpara: Chrome
Firefox LTS
Safari (not supported on Windows)
Internet Explorer

section.simpara: Hue might work with Chrome 23, Firefox 23, IE8, Safari 6, or older browser version, but you might not be able to use all of the features.
Note: CentOS 5 and RHEL 5 requires EPEL python 2.6 package.
